price: Monhunu sε, nokorε Nyankopͻn asotwee ano yεden paa, nokorε nso sε Ɔne Bͻnefakyε Hene, na Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi wa-anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
